title: Teams can be added and removed
custom_preconds: User has no favorite teams selected
custom_steps:
- Open More Menu -> Account settings -> My Teams
- Note that favorite and followed teams are not set
- Add Orioles
- Add Diamondbacks
- Note that Orioles and Diamondbacks are in correct sections
- Remove Orioles
- Note that Orioles is no longer a favorite team and favorite is empty
- Remove diamondbacks
- Note that diamond backs is no longer in favorites
custom_expected: Teams can be added and removed successfully

title: Profile overwrites teams
custom_preconds:
- User has teams set in the app
- User sets different teams via the web
custom_steps:
- Login to the app
- Quit the app and change favorite and followed teams on the web for the user
- Launch the app and navigate to team selection
custom_expected: Team selection should now be using favorite teams from the web

title: Teams carry over to web during app upgrade
custom_steps:
- Login to web and remove all favorite and followed teams
- Install previous app version and select more than 1 favorite team
- Login
- Upgrade to latest app version
custom_expected: Favorite teams set in previous app version should now be present in the profile on the web

title: Teams carry over during app upgrade
custom_steps:
- Login to web and add a favorite team and followed teams
- Install previous app version and select more than 1 favorite team
- Login
- Upgrade to latest app version
custom_expected: Favorite and followed teams in the app should now be what is present in the profile

title: Teams carry over to web after setting in app
custom_steps:
- Install latest app version and login
- Update favorite and followed teams
custom_expected: Favorite and followed teams on the web should now reflect what was set in the app

title: Teams carry over to app after setting on web
custom_steps:
- Install latest app version and login 
- Set favorite and followed teams in the app
- Login to the web and set different favorite and followed teams
- Restart the app
custom_expected: Teams in app should now reflect what was set on the web

title: Teams carry over to web after setting locally in app
custom_steps:
- Login to web and remove all favorite and followed teams
- Install latest app version and make sure user is logged out
- Set favorite and followed teams in the app
- Login
custom_expected: Favorite and followed teams on the web should now reflect the ones set locally in the app

title: Teams carry over from web after logging in, despite previous selections
custom_steps:
- Login to web and set some favorite and followed teams
- Install latest app version and make sure user is logged out
- Set favorite and followed teams in the app
- Login
custom_expected:
Favorite and followed teams in app should reflect what was set on the web
and should replace what was previously set in the app, pre-login

title: Teams update on cold start if changed via other platform
custom_preconds: Given team(s) have been set as Favorite/Followed
custom_steps:
-Login to app
-Background app
-Login to another platform (web, another iOS device)
-Make changes to team(s) via any other platform (web, another iOS device)
-Open app on cold start
custom_expected: If the favorite/followed teams do not match what is stored locally in the app then the teams are updated

title: Text when no favorite team set
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the team selection screen
and does not have a favorite team set
custom_expected:
Then the "Favorite Team" section will still be present on the team list
and it will display "No Favorite Team selected"

title: Favorite/Follow prompt if no favorite team currently set
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the team selection screen
and does not have a favorite team set
and taps to select a team
custom_expected: Then the user will be prompted to select if the team will be set as their favorite or followed team

title: Team can be set as both favorite and followed
custom_steps:
When user is on the team selection screen
and attempts to add a team as both their favorite team and as one of their followed teams
custom_expected: Then they should be able to add the team to both lists seamlessly

title: Teams added after Favorite team automatically set to Followed
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user only has a favorite team set
custom_steps: When the user adds other team(s)
custom_expected: Then the team(s) will automatically be set as Followed team(s)

title: Scoreboard stars reflect team settings
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has a favorite team and followed team(s) set
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the favorite team will be marked with a yellow star
and the followed team(s) will be marked with a grey outlined star
and the games will be sorted in that order

title: MLB.TV EPG stars reflect team settings
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has a favorite team and followed team(s) set
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the MLB.TV EPG
custom_expected:
Then the favorite team will be marked with a yellow star
and the followed team(s) will be marked with a grey outlined star
and the games will be sorted in that order
